00049 //
00050 // ContextCountGraphCopier
00051 //
00052 // 5 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTGRAPHCOPIER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTGRAPHCOPIER_HPP
00057 
00058 class ContextCountGraphCopier : public indri::lang::Copier {
00059 private:
00060   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*> _newNodes;
00061   std::vector<indri::lang::ContextCounterNode*> _contextCounters;
00062 
00063 public:
00064   indri::lang::Node* defaultAfter( indri::lang::Node* oldNode, indri::lang::Node* newNode ) {
00065     _newNodes.push_back( newNode );
00066     return newNode;
00067   }
00068 
00069   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::RawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00070     indri::lang::RawExtentNode* raw = newNode->getRawExtent();
00071     indri::lang::RawExtentNode* context = newNode->getContext();
00072     delete newNode;
00073 
00074     indri::lang::ContextCounterNode* contextCounter = new indri::lang::ContextCounterNode( raw, context );
00075     // need to match the name of the raw scorer we're counting for
00076     contextCounter->setNodeName( oldNode->nodeName() );
00077     _newNodes.push_back( contextCounter );
00078     _contextCounters.push_back( contextCounter );
00079     return contextCounter;
00080   }
00081 
00082   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*>& getNodes() {
00083     return _newNodes;
00084   }
00085 
00086   std::vector<indri::lang::ContextCounterNode*>& getContextCounterNodes() {
00087     return _contextCounters;
00088   }
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif // INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTGRAPHCOPIER_HPP
